description: The table stores coverage level primary location and PCP information.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MEMBER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient associated with the coverage level primary location and PCP.

columns.name: PCP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage level PCP.

columns.name: PCP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The PCP type for the coverage level PCP.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General

columns.name: LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage level primary location.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date for the coverage level primary location and PCP.

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.description: The termination date for the coverage level primary location and PCP.

columns.name: CHANGE_I_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the coverage level primary location and PCP were entered or changed.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that entered or changed the coverage level primary location and PCP.

columns.name: PCP_CHANGE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for changing the coverage level PCP.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CHANGE_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered for the coverage level primary location and PCP.

columns.name: DELETED_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this line of coverage level primary location and PCP information has been marked as deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CHANGE_REQ_BY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The entity that requested a change to coverage level primary location and PCP.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Member


Location

columns.name: CVG_PCP_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The selected network for the member. When Member Network Selection (HDF 18885) is on this item stores the selected network for the member. This network along with the networks the member matches to based on member matching criteria in the network record will make up the network records for the member.
